data.text: Students will becoming proficient in a foreign language and be prepared to transfer to a four-year institution. The program offers degrees that can be customized with courses in Arabic, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish, and Portuguese. Students fluent in a foreign language can seek employment as educators or translators, as well as possible careers in international business.
